questions.question_text: When an appliance is installed on a roof, the clearance between the appliance and the edge of the roof or other hazard shall be at least?
For natural gas, threaded piping less than NPS Â½ used in a piping system shall be?

options.A: Not pass through a floor, wall, ceiling or partition
options.C: Not pass through an exterior wall
options.D: Not be used on a suspended appliance

questions.question_text: A coil type boiler or water tube boiler having an input in excess of 400,000 Btu/hr requiring forced circulation to prevent overheating of the coils or tubes shall be equipped with a _______?
A moisture exhaust duct shall not terminate within _______feet in any direction of any pressure regulator vent termination or fresh air intake
A hotplate shall be connected with ____________  and secured to prevent movement
A type L vent may be used in lieu of a ____________ vent

options.A: Less than 6 feet above a paved driveway or sidewalk located on public property
options.B: Within 7 feet of a mechanical air supply inlet to any building
options.C: Less than 10 feet above a paved driveway or sidewalk located on public property
options.D: Within 6 feet of a mechanical air supply inlet to any building

questions.question_text: A power venter certified for use as an add on to a water heater may be used on a water heater that has an input of _________ Btu/hr or less
